data.title: Great start to our tour
data.text: We started a walking food tour at First Street Wine Co. We had a Livermore flight. Very nice wines paired with delicious foods. With our tour done and we returned to finish our day with another nice glass of wine at First Street WIne Co.

data.title: Excellent Wine Tasting  Venue
data.text: We sampled several wines while on a tasting tour of downtown Livermore.  The wines were a sampling of local producers.  The hostess was friendly and knowledgeable.

data.title: Relaxing
data.text: This is part of the "Tastes of the Neighborhood food tour" which I heartily recommend. Pleasant and relaxing tasting by a very friendly and knowledgeable hostess.

data.title: Linda is the Best!!
data.text: If you love wine, this is your place.  The proprietor, Linda, is great and quite knowledgeable about both the local, California, and global wines.  Go on a Thursday night and there is usually a wine-makers showcase to taste their wines.  For a small fee, but well worth it.  Located at the main square on First Street, a great place to start your evening before venturing to the wonderful local eateries.

data.title: Tasting here was underwhelming
data.text: Great ambiance, very nice server. Wine tasting here was boring. Nothing exciting not even a temptation to buy a bottle. Such a nice place and such a nice person, I would definitely return to try something different.

data.title: Friendly, enjoyed the local wines
data.text: Today we sampled four of the local wines. It's so nice to hear the back story and history of these people and wineries. Very enjoyable experience . . . Yep, we bought some too.

owner_response.author: Linda A, Owner at First Street Wine Co., responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you Valori, We are glad you enjoyed the wines and the stories. Hope to see you again soon.
Linda
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Weekend flights!
data.text: I stopped in for a drink while waiting for my boyfriend who later joined me. We had a flight of white and a flight of red $10 each on the weekend! The pours are generous, the service incredibly friendly!
